column4: hi all, does anyone know if ubuntu comes with an equivalent of the windows task manager? this 'puter has been up for over a week, and it seems to be getting slower and slower :-/
try looking for the 'Gnome System Monitor' - it's not quite advisable to kill processes as happily as you do on Windows though :)
oh, "system monitor", lemme check that out, thanks
well at least I'll have an idea what's going on :-)
